TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceProviderFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 用來做為建立資源提供者的類別之基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that create resource providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象類別，做為傳回全域和本機資源提供者的物件的基底類別。 is an abstract class that serves as the base class for objects that return global and local resource providers. 類別必須衍生自來實作其功能。Classes must derive from to implement its functionality. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站，用來擷取快取的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化衍生類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。An instance of an abstract class cannot be created. 類別衍生自可實作的建構函式來設定任何預設值。Classes that derive from can implement a constructor to set any default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateGlobalResourceProvider(string classKey) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateGlobalResourceProvider (classKey As String) As IResourceProvider

span.span: The name of the resource class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立全域資源提供者。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a global resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會傳回物件指定`classKey`參數。When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an object for the given `classKey` parameter. 無法實作方法的`classKey`App_GlobalResources 資料夾中.resx 檔案的名稱。The method could be implemented such that `classKey` is the name of a .resx file in the App_GlobalResources folder. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站實作方法擷取快取和值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the method and retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateLocalResourceProvider(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateLocalResourceProvider (virtualPath As String) As IResourceProvider

span.span: The path to a resource file.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立本機資源提供者。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a local resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會傳回物件指定`virtualPath`參數。When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an object for the given `virtualPath` parameter. 無法實作方法的`virtualPath`對應至資源檔。The method could be implemented such that `virtualPath` maps to a resource file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站實作方法擷取快取和值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the method and retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
